title: Magical Pumpkin Seed
summaries: The Magical Pumpkin Seed is a pet-summoning item that summons a pet Squashling. When the player is far enough away or in midair, the Squashling will twirl and fly after the player to catch up to them. The Magical Pumpkin Seed has a 1/200 (0.5%) chance of being obtained from harvesting fully-grown Pumpkins during the Halloween seasonal event.

statistics.Sell: 2 GC
